abstract.t: This document updates NMDA [RFC 8342] to define a read-only conventional configuration datastore called "system" to hold system- defined configurations. To support non-NMDA servers, a "with-system" parameter has been defined to return <running> and system-defined configuration combined. The solution enables clients to reference nodes defined in <system>, overwrite values of configurations defined in <system>, and configure descendant nodes of system-defined nodes.
